# Awesome Nutrient

![The PDF SDK Developers Trust](./resources/header.png)

[![Awesome](https://awesome.re/badge-flat.svg)](https://awesome.re)
[![Chat](https://img.shields.io/badge/chat-on_discord-7289da.svg)](https://discord.gg/Z754Pfb8bD)

This repository contains examples built with [Nutrient](https://www.nutrient.io/). These examples are not officially supported, which means they may stop working and not be fixed, but they exist to serve for inspiration. Read [the disclaimer](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-nutrient/blob/master/DISCLAIMER.md) or [reach out if you have questions](https://support.nutrient.io/hc/en-us/requests/new).

## Web

A wide variety of examples showcasing what Nutrient Web SDK can do can be found in the [Example Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-web-examples-catalog). You can also [try them online](https://web-examples.our.services.nutrient-powered.io/).

- **Electronic signatures** — Use our API to add electronic signature images to PDFs.
- **Watermarks** — Add custom content (like images, text, and logos) as watermarks to your PDF pages.
- **Image annotations** — Annotate images with Nutrient Web SDK.
- **Custom UI for annotations** — Create a fully customized UI for working with annotations.
- **Custom annotation permissions** — Define custom permissions for annotation types.
- **Custom annotation tools** — Add your own tools or actions when an annotation is selected.
- **Custom toolbar tools** — Add custom tools to the PDF toolbar.
- **PDF page manipulation** — Add, remove, reorder, or rotate pages in a PDF.
- **Advanced PDF search** — Modify PDF search behavior.
- **Custom overlays** — Extend PDFs by adding your own elements to pages.
- **Selective area revealing** — Allow users to hide/reveal areas on a PDF page.
- **HTML-based annotation customization** — Enhance or replace existing PDF annotations using custom HTML.
- **Dark mode** — Switch to dark mode programmatically.
- **Custom views and drag and drop** — Add custom views for dragging and dropping image elements.
- **Document editor customization** — Customize the document editor toolbar and footer items.
- **Page flip effect** — Create a magazine-like browsing experience.
- **Permissions enforcement** — Set permissions based on JSON Web Token (JWT) parameters.
- **Electronic signatures persistence** — Keep electronic signatures across page refreshes.

## Web SDK Examples

- [Web Examples](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples)
- [React](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/react)
- [Angular](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/angular)
- [Next](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/nextjs)
- [Nuxt]( https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/nuxtjs)

#### Annotations

- [Watermark from text annotation](https://nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - Dynamically add watermark text annotations to PDF pages before flattening them into a document

- [Straighten freeform highlight](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D) 
  - Convert freeform ink annotations into highlight annotations

- [Add ink stroke color preset to custom buttons](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%%252FIFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtLCByZWRJbmtUb29sLCBibHVlSW5rVG9vbF1cbiAgICAgICAgICA6IFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtXSxcbiAgICAgIFtdXG4gICAgKVxuICApO1xufSk7XG4ifQ%253D%253D)
  - Customize the toolbar to add two custom ink annotation buttons — one for red ink and one for blue ink — alongside the default ink annotation tool

- [Custom outlines for shape annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%%253D%253D)
  - Customize shape annotations by adding an outline

- [Customize annotation creators](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252Be2NvbnN0IHNlbGVjdE5vZGU9ZG9jdW1lbnQuY3JlYXRlRWxlbWVudCgnc2VsZWN0Jyk7c2VsZWN0Tm9kZS5pbm5lckhUTUw9Y3JlYXRvcnMubWFwKChjcmVhdG9yPT5gPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIiR7Y3JlYXRvcn1cIj4ke2NyZWF0b3J9PC9vcHRpb24%%)
  - Create and customize stamp annotations with multiple creators

- [Prevent dragging annotations but keep them selectable](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%252FaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGluZ0Fubm90YXRpb24oYW5ub3RhdGlvbix7YXV0b1NlbGVjdFRleHQ6ITF9KTpcbi8vSGFuZGxpbmcgc3BlY2lhbCBjYXNlIGZvciBOb3RlcyBzbGlnaGx0eSBkaWZmZXJlbnQgdGhhbiBUZXh0IEFubm90YXRpb25zXG5hbm5vdGF0aW9uIGluc3RhbmNlb2YgUFNQREZLaXQuQW5ub3RhdGlvbnMuTm90ZUFubm90YXRpb24%)

- [Prevent ink signature from drag and resize while allowing its deletion](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)

- [Programmatically create a comment thread](https://nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Programmatically add a comment marker annotation and an associated comment while setting the annotation creator's name

- [Open URL from image annotation](https://nutrient.io/playground?)

- [Display highlighted text in annotation sidebar](https://playground.pspdfkit.com/?%) 
  - Customize the annotation sidebar to display highlighted text and allow annotation editing (except for signatures)

- [Hide link annotations tooltip](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Hide the popover element when a link annotation is selected

- [Handle interactions with notes attached to annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%)

- [Use custom renderers to display annotation information on hover](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BPC9kaXY%252BYDtcblxuICAgICAgcmV0dXJuIHtcbiAgICAgICAgbm9kZTogdG9vbHRpcENvbnRhaW5lcixcbiAgICAgICAgYXBwZW5kOiB0cnVlLFxuICAgICAgfTtcbiAgICB9LFxuICB9LFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%252BIHtcbiAgLy8gRGlzYWJsZSBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGVkaXRpbmdcbiAgaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGFibGVBbm5vdGF0aW9uVHlwZXMoW10pO1xuXG4gIC8vIEhlbHBlciBmdW5jdGlvbiB0byBmaW5kIGFubm90YXRpb24gZWxlbWVudCBieSBJRFxuICBjb25zdCBnZXRBbm5vdGF0aW9uRWxlbWVudCA9IChhbm5vdGF0aW9uSWQpID0%%%252BXG4gICAgaGFuZGxlQW5ub3RhdGlvbkludGVyYWN0aW9uKGV2ZW50LCBmYWxzZSlcbiAgKTtcbn0pO1xuIiwibW9kZSI6InN0YW5kYWxvbmUifQ%253D%253D)
  - Enhance annotations by adding hover-based tooltips while preventing edits

- [Create highlight annotations programmatically from search](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Search for specific text values in a document, create highlight annotations for the found text, and apply those annotations to the document

- [Use custom actions with the embedded PDF widget button](https://nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Create a button form field, add an event listener to handle button clicks that trigger a file input for uploading images, and attach the selected image as an annotation in the document

- [Prevent showing note annotation content on hover](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Add an event listener to hide the note annotation popover when the mouse is over the note icon

- [Link comments with annotations](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comment-annotations)
  - When an annotation is selected, a tooltip appears, allowing users to create a linked comment marker annotation

- [Create annotations from the clipboard](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/create-annotation-from-clipboard)
  - Enable pasting content from the clipboard onto a PDF as a text or image annotation

- [Navigate annotations with a custom toolbar button](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/get-all-annotations-boundingBox)
  - Get all annotation coordinates and seamlessly navigate with a custom “Next Annotation” button that highlights and jumps to each annotation

- [Snip and save annotations as JPEG images](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/snipping-annotation)
  - Snip the area covered by an annotation and save it as a JPEG image

- [Add a timestamp as a subtitle to a custom stamp](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BKFxuLy8gRXZlcnkgdGltZSBTdGFtcHMgTGlzdCBvcGVucywgd2Ugd2FudCB0byBzZXQgY29ycmVjdCBkYXRlIHRvIGN1c3RvbSBzdGFtcHNcbmluc3RhbmNlLnNldFN0YW1wQW5ub3RhdGlvblRlbXBsYXRlcygodGVtcGxhdGVzPT50ZW1wbGF0ZXMubWFwKCh0ZW1wbGF0ZT0%252BJ0N1c3RvbSc9PT10ZW1wbGF0ZS5zdGFtcFR5cGU%252FdGVtcGxhdGUuc2V0KCdzdWJ0aXRsZScsbmV3IERhdGUoRGF0ZS5ub3coKSkudG9Mb2NhbGVTdHJpbmcoKSk6dGVtcGxhdGUpKSkpLHt9KX19KS50aGVuKChpbnN0YW5jZT0%%253D)
  - Add a custom stamp annotation template with dynamic subtitle text (including the current date and time), and set up the UI to update the subtitle each time the stamps list is opened

- [Add and count a checkmark annotation in the toolbar](https://nutrient.io/playground/?%%2BIHtcbiAgICBpZiAoaXRlbS50eXBlID09PSBcImV4cG9ydC1wZGZcIikge1xuICAgICAgcmV0dXJuIGFjYy5jb25jYXQoW1xuICAgICAgICBpdGVtLFxuICAgICAgICBjb3VudGVySXRlbVxuICAgICAgXSk7XG4gICAgfSBlbHNlIHtcbiAgICAgIHJldHVybiBhY2MuY29uY2F0KFtpdGVtXSk7XG4gICAgfVxuICB9LCBbXSksXG59KS50aGVuKGFzeW5jIChfaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%2BIHtcbiAgaW5zdGFuY2UgPSBfaW5zdGFuY2U7XG5cbiAgLy8gR2V0IGFuZCBsb2cgdGhlIG51bWJlciBvZiBjb3VudGVyIHN0YW1wIGFubm90YXRpb25zIGV2ZXJ5dGltZVxuICAvLyBhIG5ldyBhbm5vdGF0aW9ucyBpcyBjcmVhdGVkLlxuICBpbnN0YW5jZS5hZGRFdmVudExpc3RlbmVyKFwiYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMuY3JlYXRlXCIsIGFzeW5jICgpID0%%%3D%3D)
  - Use a custom toolbar button for toggling stamp creation mode, allowing users to add "Accepted" stamp annotations on page press and track the total count of such annotations across a document

#### Redaction

- [Redact keywords programmatically](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Load a PDF, search for keywords, create redaction annotations over the found text, and apply the redactions to permanently remove the text.
  
- [Apply redactions to text with an overlay](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Load a PDF, retrieve all text lines from every page, create redaction annotations over the detected text using an overlay, and apply the redactions to the document.

- [Approve or reject redactions before applying](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/redact-one-by-one)
  - Manage redaction annotations from an annotation tooltip with two options that allow you to apply or reject redactions one by one.
  
- [Add a custom tooltip to a redaction annotation](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - Add redaction tools to the toolbar and modify the tooltip behavior for redaction annotations.

#### Comments

- [Set annotation creator name](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Set an annotation creator’s name, ensuring any annotations — including comments — made by that user are attributed to them.
  
- [Link comments with annotations](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comment-annotations)

- [Add custom buttons for customizing comments](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comments-status)
  - Customize the comments popover by adding custom actions, like approve and reject, allowing users to manage comments efficiently.

#### Signing

- [Disable Editing a Signature After Creation](https://nutrient.io/playground?)
- [Apply Signature OnClick](https://nutrient.io/playground?%2BIHtcbiAgbGV0IHN0b3JlZFNpZ25hdHVyZTtcblxuICAvL0dldHRpbmcgYWxsIGZvcm0gZmllbGRzIHRvIHVzZSBpbiBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIHByZXNzIGV2ZW50XG4gIGNvbnN0IGZvcm1GaWVsZHMgPSBhd2FpdCBpbnN0YW5jZS5nZXRGb3JtRmllbGRzKCk7XG5cbiAgaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcihcImFubm90YXRpb25zLmNyZWF0ZVwiLCAoYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMpID0%%%)

- [Sign Here Widget With More Functionality](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/signing/sign-here-upgraded)
- [Change Default Size for Signatures](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BYW5ub3RhdGlvbiBpbnN0YW5jZW9mIFBTUERGS2l0LkFubm90YXRpb25zLklua0Fubm90YXRpb24pKSxjcmVhdGVkQW5ub3RhdGlvbnM9Y3JlYXRlZEFubm90YXRpb25zLm1hcCgoYW5ub3RhdGlvbj0%%%253D%253D)
- [Get the Last Signed Signature Field](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
- [A Complete Frontend Signing POC in NextJS](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/signing/signing-demo-complete)
- [Lightweight Multi-Party Signing Example in Vanilla JS](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/document-generator-vanillajs)
- [Smoothly Scroll Into The Next Signature Field](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252Be3BhZ2Uuc2Nyb2xsSW50b1ZpZXcoe2Jsb2NrOidlbmQnLGlubGluZTonbmVhcmVzdCcsYmVoYXZpb3I6J3Ntb290aCd9KX0pKX1sb2NhbFN0b3JhZ2Uuc2V0SXRlbSgnZm9ybS1jb3VudGVyJywnMCcpLFBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoey4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zLHRoZW1lOlBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUkssaXNFZGl0YWJsZUFubm90YXRpb246YW5ub3RhdGlvbj0%%%252FLmN1c3RvbURhdGE%%%252Be2Zvcm1FbGVtZW50c0l0ZXJhdG9yKHBhZ2VBbm5vdGF0aW9uc1tjb3VudGVyXS5wYWdlSW5kZXgscGFnZUFubm90YXRpb25zW2NvdW50ZXJdLmJvdW5kaW5nQm94KX0pLDFlMykpfSkpfSkpOyIsIm1vZGUiOiJzdGFuZGFsb25lIn0%253D)

#### Forms

- [Add Custom Button To Form Field Configuration](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIlRlbmFudFwiPlRlbmFudDwvb3B0aW9uPjwvc2VsZWN0PjwvbGFiZWw%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BJztcbi8vRXZlbnQgbGlzdGVuZXIgdG8gY2hlY2sgd2hlaHRlciB0aGUgY2xpY2tlZCBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGlzIGEgU2lnbmF0dXJlIFdpZGdldFxuaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcignYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMucHJlc3MnLChhc3luYyBldmVudD0%%%%252FLnVzZXJSb2xlfSBmb3IgQW5ub3RhdGlvbjogJHthbm5vdGF0aW9uLmdldCgwKS5pZH1gKX0pKX0pKTsiLCJtb2RlIjoic3RhbmRhbG9uZSJ9)

- [Show Redaction Annotations in the Annotation Sidebar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - By default some annotation types are hidden in the annotation sidebar by design. This example showcases the API used to enable showing those types if needed.

#### Viewer

- [Zoom-In/Zoom-Out With Scroll](https://nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6IlBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoey4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zLHRoZW1lOlBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUkt9KS50aGVuKChpbnN0YW5jZT0%%%253D)
- [Export Selected Pages in Document Editor](https://nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
- [Regular Expression (Regex) Search](https://nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6ImNvbnN0IGl0ZW09e3R5cGU6J2N1c3RvbScsaWQ6J215LWJ1dHRvbicsdGl0bGU6J015IEJ1dHRvbicsb25QcmVzczpldmVudD0%252Be2FsZXJ0KCdoZWxsbyBmcm9tIG15IGJ1dHRvbicpfX07dmFyIGluc3RhbmNlR2xvYmFsO1BTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoey4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zfSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2U9PntsZXQgbGFzdFNlYXJjaFRlcm09Jyc7aW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcignc2VhcmNoLnRlcm1DaGFuZ2UnLChhc3luYyBldmVudD0%%253D)
- [Print Single Page](https://nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6ImNvbnN0IGl0ZW09e3R5cGU6J2N1c3RvbScsaWQ6J215LWJ1dHRvbicsdGl0bGU6J015IEJ1dHRvbicsb25QcmVzczpldmVudD0%252Be2FsZXJ0KCdoZWxsbyBmcm9tIG15IGJ1dHRvbicpfX07dmFyIGluc3RhbmNlR2xvYmFsO1BTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoey4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zLHRoZW1lOlBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUkssdG9vbGJhckl0ZW1zOlBTUERGS2l0LmRlZmF1bHRUb29sYmFySXRlbXMucmVkdWNlKCgoYWNjLGl0ZW0pPT4nZXhwb3J0LXBkZic9PT1pdGVtLnR5cGU%%%%253D).

## .NET Coming Soon

## Design System

- [Baseline UI](https://www.nutrient.io/baseline-ui/)
  - A set of customisable and accessible React components.
- [Add custom button to main toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - This examples adds a custom button to the main toolbar.
- [Change label of thumbnails in Thumbnails Sidebar to a string](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - This example changes the thumbnails label in the thumbnail sidebar to a custom strings.
- [Change cancel button in Document Editor Modal variant](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - This examples makes the cancel button in the the Document Editor Dialog red.
- [Add a custom button in the Create Signature Modal that changes a custom state](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%252Be2NvbnNvbGUubG9nKCdQU1BERktpdCBsb2FkZWQhJyksY29uc29sZS5sb2coJ0FQSSBkb2NzOiBodHRwczovL3BzcGRma2l0LmNvbS9hcGkvd2ViLycpLGNvbnNvbGUubG9nKCdHdWlkZXM6IGh0dHBzOi8vcHNwZGZraXQuY29tL2d1aWRlcy93ZWIvJyl9KSk7In0%253D)
  - This examples displays and changes a custom state in the Create Signature Modal

## AI
- [Document Assistant for PSPDFKit](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/ai-document-assistant-demo)
  - AI Document Assistant for PSPDFKit Demo showcases how to interact with PDFs using natural language commands powered by AI, integrated with Nutrient Web SDK.

## Document Authoring
- [Document Generator VanillaJS](./web/document-generator-vanillajs/)
  - A fully functional step-by-step document generator that brings the user from a template to a PDF document, where they get to make modifications on every step of the way. Demonstrates the combined capabilities of Nutrient's Document Authoring and Web SDKs.

## iOS

- [iOS Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-ios-catalog)
  - A wide variety of examples what Nutrient iOS SDK can do. Clone it and play with it.

## Android

- [Android Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-android-catalog)
  - A wide variety of examples what Nutrient Android SDK can do. Clone it and play with it.

## Windows
- [Using Nutrient Web SDK in WinUI3 app](/windows/pspdfkit-with-winui3)
  - Learn how to use web SDK in WinUI3 app or any app that supports WebView2.

## Cross-Platform

- [React Native Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/react-native/tree/master/samples/Catalog)
  - A diverse range of examples showcasing what Nutrient React Native SDK is capable of. Clone the repository and explore its features firsthand.
- [MAUI Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-maui-catalog)
  - A diverse range of examples showcasing what Nutrient MAUI SDK is capable of. Clone the repository and explore its features.
- [Flutter Sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-flutter/tree/master/example)
  - Discover a practical example showcasing the power of Nutrient Flutter SDK.
- [.NET for Android Sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/dotnet-pdf-library-for-android/tree/main/samples)
  - Learn how to use C# Bindings for Nutrient Android SDK.
- [.NET for iOS Sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/dotnet-pdf-library-for-ios/tree/main/Samples)
  - Learn how to use C# Bindings for Nutrient iOS SDK.
